index.html:
<body>
  <script>
    // Add your code below this line
    
    const scale = d3.scaleLinear(); // Create the scale here
    const output = scale(50); // Call the scale with an argument here
    
    // Add your code above this line
    
    d3.select("body")
      .append("h2")
      .text(output);
  
  </script>
</body>
